p: First, except for the Yunnan Baiyao Group and the Dihon Pharmaceutical Company, most of the pharmaceutical manufacturers of EPMs in Yunnan Province are small enterprises, thereby limiting research and development capacity. A search on the China National Knowledge Infrastructure (CNKI, http://www.cnki.net) found 163 articles that reported investigations of these 28 DPMs reviewed here and 59 articles about Yunnan Baiyao Aerosol, whereas it is only one of the CPMs produced by the Yunnan Baiyao Group. In 2015, 100 million bottles of Yunnan Baiyao Aerosol were produced, with a value of more 1.5 billion RMB. In the same year, the overall sales revenue of the Yunnan Baiyao Group was 20.74 billion RMB [ 7].
